long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a toolbar button to save the current page to hackershare.dev. with hackershare toolbar, you can save the url you viewed easily and share it with other hacker. hackershare.dev is center of all url.
